verses.verse: וַיִּגַּע֙ <S%H5060><s%> was come הַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> And when the seventh וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בֶּעָרִ֑ים <S%H5892><s%> [were] in the cities ס וַיֵּאָסְפ֥וּ <S%H622><s%> gathered themselves together הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> the people כְּאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> as one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem ס

וַיָּקָם֩ <S%H6965><s%> Then stood up יֵשׁ֨וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> Jeshua בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יֽוֹצָדָ֜ק <S%H3136><s%> of Jozadak וְאֶחָ֣יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren הַכֹּהֲנִ֗ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests וּזְרֻבָּבֶ֤ל <S%H2216><s%> and Zerubbabel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל֙ <S%H7597><s%> of Shealtiel וְאֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren וַיִּבְנ֕וּ <S%H1129><s%> and builded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִזְבַּ֖ח <S%H4196><s%> the altar אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְהַעֲל֤וֹת <S%H5927><s%> to offer עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> and עֹל֔וֹת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings כַּכָּת֕וּב <S%H3789><s%> thereon as [it is] written בְּתוֹרַ֖ת <S%H8451><s%> in the law מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> the man הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

וַיָּכִ֤ינוּ <S%H3559><s%> And they set הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> the altar עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מְכ֣וֹנֹתָ֔יו <S%H4350><s%> upon his bases כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for בְּאֵימָ֣ה <S%H367><s%> for fear עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> of מֵעַמֵּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> [was] upon them because of the people הָאֲרָצ֑וֹת <S%H776><s%> of those countries [וַיַּעַל כ] (וַיַּעֲל֨וּ <S%H5927><s%> arise ק) עָלָ֤יו <S%H5921><s%> and עֹלוֹת֙ <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> thereon unto the LORD עֹל֖וֹת <S%H5930><s%> [even] burnt offerings לַבֹּ֥קֶר <S%H1242><s%> morning וְלָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> and evening

וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֛וּ <S%H6213><s%> They kept אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַ֥ג <S%H2282><s%> also the feast הַסֻּכּ֖וֹת <S%H5521><s%> of tabernacles כַּכָּת֑וּב <S%H3789><s%> as [it is] written וְעֹלַ֨ת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings י֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> of every day בְּיוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> required בְּמִסְפָּ֔ר <S%H4557><s%> by number כְּמִשְׁפַּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> according to the custom דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> as the duty י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day בְּיוֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H3117><s%> day

וְאַחֲרֵיכֵ֞ן <S%H310><s%> And afterward עֹלַ֤ת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offering תָּמִיד֙ <S%H8548><s%> [offered] the continual וְלֶ֣חֳדָשִׁ֔ים <S%H2320><s%> both of the new moons וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and for all מוֹעֲדֵ֥י <S%H4150><s%> and of all the set feasts יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הַמְקֻדָּשִׁ֑ים <S%H6942><s%> that were consecrated וּלְכֹ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> everyone מִתְנַדֵּ֥ב <S%H5068><s%> and of every one that willingly offered נְדָבָ֖ה <S%H5071><s%> a freewill offering לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

מִיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> From the first לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> of the seventh הֵחֵ֕לּוּ <S%H2490><s%> began לְהַעֲל֥וֹת <S%H5927><s%> they to offer עֹל֖וֹת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> God וְהֵיכַ֥ל <S%H1964><s%> of the temple יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> but יֻסָּֽד׃ <S%H3245><s%> was not [yet] laid

וַיִּ֨תְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> They gave כֶ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> money לַחֹצְבִ֖ים <S%H2672><s%> also unto the masons וְלֶחָרָשִׁ֑ים <S%H2796><s%> and to the carpenters וּמַאֲכָ֨ל <S%H3978><s%> and meat וּמִשְׁתֶּ֜ה <S%H4960><s%> and drink וָשֶׁ֗מֶן <S%H8081><s%> and oil לַצִּֽדֹנִים֙ <S%H6722><s%> unto them of Zidon וְלַצֹּרִ֔ים <S%H6876><s%> and to them of Tyre לְהָבִיא֩ <S%H935><s%> to bring עֲצֵ֨י <S%H6086><s%> trees אֲרָזִ֤ים <S%H730><s%> cedar מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַלְּבָנוֹן֙ <S%H3844><s%> from Lebanon אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יָ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> to the sea יָפ֔וֹא <S%H3305><s%> of Joppa כְּרִשְׁי֛וֹן <S%H7558><s%> according to the grant כּ֥וֹרֶשׁ <S%H3566><s%> that they had of Cyrus מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king פָּרַ֖ס <S%H6539><s%> of Persia עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> and פ

וּבַשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַשֵּׁנִ֗ית <S%H8145><s%> Now in the second לְבוֹאָ֞ם <S%H935><s%> of their coming אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בֵּ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> of God לִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem בַּחֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשֵּׁנִ֑י <S%H8145><s%> in the second הֵחֵ֡לּוּ <S%H2490><s%> began זְרֻבָּבֶ֣ל <S%H2216><s%> Zerubbabel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שְׁ֠אַלְתִּיאֵל <S%H7597><s%> of Shealtiel וְיֵשׁ֨וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> and Jeshua בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יֽוֹצָדָ֜ק <S%H3136><s%> of Jozadak וּשְׁאָ֥ר <S%H7605><s%> and the remnant אֲחֵיהֶ֣ם ׀ <S%H251><s%> of their brethren הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֗ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַבָּאִים֙ <S%H935><s%> and all they that were come out מֵהַשְּׁבִ֣י <S%H7628><s%> of the captivity יְרֽוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> unto Jerusalem וַיַּעֲמִ֣ידוּ <S%H5975><s%> and appointed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites מִבֶּ֨ן <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> and upward לְנַצֵּ֖חַ <S%H5329><s%> to set forward עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מְלֶ֥אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> the work בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD פ

וַיַּעֲמֹ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> Then stood יֵשׁ֡וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> Jeshua בָּנָ֣יו <S%H1121><s%> [with] his sons וְ֠אֶחָיו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren קַדְמִיאֵ֨ל <S%H6934><s%> Kadmiel וּבָנָ֤יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the sons יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah כְּאֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> together לְנַצֵּ֛חַ <S%H5329><s%> to set forward עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and עֹשֵׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> accomplish הַמְּלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> the workmen בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God ס בְּנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> the sons חֵֽנָדָ֔ד <S%H2582><s%> of Henadad בְּנֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H1121><s%> [with] their sons וַאֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H251><s%> and their brethren הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> the Levites

וְיִסְּד֥וּ <S%H3245><s%> laid the foundation הַבֹּנִ֖ים <S%H1129><s%> And when the builders אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֵיכַ֣ל <S%H1964><s%> of the temple יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיַּעֲמִידוּ֩ <S%H5975><s%> they set הַכֹּהֲנִ֨ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests מְלֻבָּשִׁ֜ים <S%H3847><s%> in their apparel בַּחֲצֹֽצְר֗וֹת <S%H2689><s%> with trumpets וְהַלְוִיִּ֤ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the sons אָסָף֙ <S%H623><s%> of Asaph בַּֽמְצִלְתַּ֔יִם <S%H4700><s%> with cymbals לְהַלֵּל֙ <S%H1984><s%> to praise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according יְדֵ֖י <S%H3027><s%> after the ordinance דָּוִ֥יד <S%H1732><s%> of David מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַֽ֠יַּעֲנוּ <S%H6030><s%> And they sang together by course בְּהַלֵּ֨ל <S%H1984><s%> in praising וּבְהוֹדֹ֤ת <S%H3034><s%> and giving thanks לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for ט֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> because [he is] good כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּ֖וֹ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> toward Israel וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֡ם <S%H5971><s%> And all the people הֵרִיעוּ֩ <S%H7321><s%> shouted תְרוּעָ֨ה <S%H8643><s%> shout גְדוֹלָ֤ה <S%H1419><s%> with a great בְהַלֵּל֙ <S%H1984><s%> when they praised לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> because הוּסַ֥ד <S%H3245><s%> was laid בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD ס

וְרַבִּ֡ים <S%H7227><s%> But many מֵהַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests וְהַלְוִיִּם֩ <S%H3881><s%> and Levites וְרָאשֵׁ֨י <S%H7218><s%> and chief הָאָב֜וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers הַזְּקֵנִ֗ים <S%H2205><s%> [who were] ancient men אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who רָא֜וּ <S%H7200><s%> that had seen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבַּ֤יִת <S%H1004><s%> house הָֽרִאשׁוֹן֙ <S%H7223><s%> the first בְּיָסְד֔וֹ <S%H3245><s%> was laid זֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> of this הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> of this house בְּעֵ֣ינֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5869><s%> before their eyes בֹּכִ֖ים <S%H1058><s%> wept בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> voice גָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> with a loud וְרַבִּ֛ים <S%H7227><s%> and many בִּתְרוּעָ֥ה <S%H8643><s%> shouted בְשִׂמְחָ֖ה <S%H8057><s%> for joy לְהָרִ֥ים <S%H7311><s%> aloud קֽוֹל׃ <S%H6963><s%> voice

וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> that הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> So that the people מַכִּירִים֙ <S%H5234><s%> could not discern ק֚וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the noise תְּרוּעַ֣ת <S%H8643><s%> of the shout הַשִּׂמְחָ֔ה <S%H8057><s%> of joy לְק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> from the noise בְּכִ֣י <S%H1065><s%> of the weeping הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> for the people מְרִיעִים֙ <S%H7321><s%> shouted תְּרוּעָ֣ה <S%H8643><s%> shout גְדוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1419><s%> with a loud וְהַקּ֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and the noise נִשְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> was heard עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against לְמֵרָחֽוֹק׃ <S%H7350><s%> afar off פ
